channel.title: Need help with my server
channel.description:
well i read all the faq's right and did everything correct to create a server. My run.bat starts up, but when i log in it says its down how the heck do i fix this??
when i ping it, it just tells me its timedout[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2007, 04:40:26 PM[/size][hr]no1 knows???
i downloaded the testscape version[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2007, 05:20:00 PM[/size][hr]when i run my run.bat file it says
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "N pcID" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:751) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:26)
wtf help wanted plox.

item.title: Need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @truepk truepk
item.description:
@truepk wrote:

well i read all the faq’s right and did everything correct to create a server.
My run.bat starts up, but when i log in it says its down how the heck do i fix this??

when i ping it, it just tells me its timedout[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 08, 2007, 04:40:26 PM[/size][hr]no1 knows???

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “N
pcID”

wtf help wanted plox.
